attributes.action: not close Shepherds Bush Station for 9 months for 'Engineering Works'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unneccessary to close Shepherds Bush tube station for 9 months to carry out engineering works.  Other stations are cabable of staying open during renovation and so should Shepherds Bush.  All other renovation works for the new shopping centre are overunning their works programmes and we cannot risk be without public transport for such an unreasonable time frame.
